newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Measurex debuts at 11.00 rgt.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Measurex debuts at 11.00 rgt.

text.p: Measurex Corp Bhd stock listed on the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange's Second Board on Thursday at 11.00 ringgit, against a 7.00 ringgit offer price.
The company, which makes precision parts and components, had offered 17.955 million shares in its issue. At 0134 GMT, the stock was trading at 11.90 ringgit.
The company's products include components such as actuator arms for hard disk drives for the computer storage media industry.
For the 10 months ended October 31, 1996, the company reported net profit of 14.61 million ringgit or 50.96 cents a share on turnover of 58.19 million ringgit.
In the 1995 calendar year, its net profit was 17.62 million ringgit or 51.21 cents a share on turnover of 59.22 million ringgit.
Measurex has forecast net profit of 20.80 million ringgit or 66.2 cents a share for the year ended December 31, 1997.
